name: Lat Pullldown
description: 1. Using a Lat Pulldown station sit down and grasp bar with overhand grip 2. Without moving your torso pull the bar down to your chest squeezing your shoulder blades 3. Slowly return weight to start position and repeat for desired reps
variation: Wide-Grip Lat Pulldown, Close-Grip Lat Pulldown

name: Standing Cable Pullover
description: 1. Stand in front of cable pulley with bar attached 2. Using and overhand grip grasp bar with slightly over shoulder width grip 3. Using a solid foundation keeping back and arms straight pull the bar down until it touches your thighs 4. Slowly return the weight to start position and repeat for desired reps

name: Seated Cable Row
description: 1. Using seated cable row station sit down with desired attachment (may use different attachments for different grips) 2. Place feet into position and keep knees slightly bent grabbing selected attachment 3. Without moving your torso pull the attachment to your upper abdomen 4. Slowly return weight to start position without moving torso and repeat for desired reps

name: Single Arm Dumbbell Row
description: 1. Using bench for support stand with feet forming strong base and place one hand on bench making back parallel to floor 2. Using a single dumbbell with non-supporting arm grasp with neutral grip palm facing body 3. Without turning or moving your torso pull weight upward to chest or just outside the chest 4. Slowly return the weight to start position and repeat for desired reps
